Params[3]: Report, Commandant. We have confirmed that the abnormal bionic signal has been destroyed.

Params[2]: Let's take a moment to rest.

Params[3]: Are these data fragments that we've collected a part of Amberia's "dream"...?
This is the fragmented data left by Amberia in the Virtual M.I.N.D. of the bionics. It's not unlike a dream.
I think it's less like a "dream", and more like a "memory".
So maybe this is what Amberia... experienced during her past life.
